songs.title: We’ve Got Obsessions (Demo)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Sunday, wake up, give me a cigarette
Last night's love affair is looking vulnerable in my bed
Silk sheet, blue dawn
Colgate, tongue warm

[Pre-Chorus 1]
Won't you quit your crying? I can't sleep
One minute I'm a little sweetheart
And next minute you are an absolute creep

[Chorus 1]
We've got obsessions
I want to wipe out by all the sad ideas that come to me when I am holding you
We've got obsessions
All you ever think about are sick ideas involving me, involving you

[Verse 2]
Supermarket, oh, what packet of crackers to pick?
They're all the same, one brand, one name, but really they're not
Look, look, just choose something quick
People are staring, time to go quicking, cheek's on fire
Just choose something, something, something!

Pressure overwhelming, next minute I am turning out of door
To facing one week without food
A day, a day, when things, things are pretty bad
Don't let it make you feel sad
The crackers were probably bad luck anyway

[Pre-Chorus 2]
Can't let your cold heart be free
When you act like you've got an OCD

[Chorus 2]
We've got obsessions
I wanna erase every nasty thought that bugs me every day of every week
We've got obsessions
You never told me what it is that makes strong and what it is that made you weak

[Bridge]
Aah, aah-aah
Aah, aah-aah, aah, aah, aah, aah-aah, aah
Aah, aah, aah, aah-aah
Aah, aah-aah
Aah, aah-aah, aah, aah, aah, aah-aah, aah
Aah, aah, aah, aah-aah
Aah, aah-aah
Aah, aah-aah, aah, aah, aah, aah-aah, aah
Aah, aah, aah, aah-aah
Aah, aah-aah, aah
Aah, aah-aah
Aah, aah, aah, aah, aah-aah, aah-aah, aah

[Chorus 2]
We've got obsessions
I wanna erase every nasty thought that bugs me every day of every week
We've got obsessions
You never told me what it was that made you strong and what it was that made you weak

[Post-Chorus]
(We've got obsessions)
Mades you weak, makes you weak
Make you we-e-e-eak
(We've got obsessions)
Make you weak, make you weak, make you...

[Outro]
Sunday, wake up, give me a cigarette
Last night's love affair is looking vulnerable again
